title: Limited Skins
body:
Having played a couple of matches yesterday using my Silver Kayle skin, it came to my attention that nothing really shows that it's a limited skin.

Legacy Skins get those fancy borders if you had them originally before they made a return.
The Project Skins that came out last year have a fancy border if you bought them on release.

Can we get a fancy border for Limited Skins?
I want my Silver Kayle, PAX Sivir and PAX Jax skins to stand out more.
I'm sure I'm not the only person who'd like this either.

Also shout out to any OCE players with these limited skins. I've only ever seen myself with PAX Jax and Silver Kayle, seen one other PAX Sivir.
Though I have a friend who has all PAX Skins.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

you're getting your skins mixed up.
legacy skins aren't the rare ones, they come back every time riot opens the legacy vault. they don't get the border around them.
limited skins are released once, and should never be released again. if you originally owned them, you get the special border around them.
They turned some Limited Skins into Legacy skins. That's what the borders were for...
